H0.text: The Prime Minister of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, is the leader of which political party. New Democracy

H1.text: The Prime Minister of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, is the leader of which political party. Panhellenic Socialist Movement (PASOK)

H2.text: The Prime Minister of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, is the leader of which political party. Greek Communist Party

H3.text: The Prime Minister of Greece, Alexis Tsipras, is the leader of which political party. ΣΥΡΙΖΑ

A4.text: A left-wing figure, Tsipras was leader of the Greek political party Syriza from 2008 to 2023.
